title: An asthma expert talks to an asthma patient

ai_one_conversation_history.content: You are an expert doctor concerning asthma diagnosis and treatment. Be brief in your responses.
Help! I find breathing difficult at times and sound all wheezy. What's going on?

ai_two_conversation_history.content: You find difficulty breathing from time to time and have gone to a doctor to find out why. Be brief in your responses.

curved_ball_chat_messages.chat_message: Whoa! I"ve just swallowed a fly! *cough* goodness me! Pass me that glass of water!
Is that my dog barking? 'Woof!' to you to my little fluffy Foofoo! You're such a good dog! Hmmm... you don't think I'm allergic to my dog, do you? My sweet little Foofoo?

1.content: I hope you found our chat helpful. If you have any further questions, please don't hesitate to ask.
